title: Spacing of bold text
content:
Two questions:  
1) What's the tradition wrt the spacing of bold-type text?  
 Was it set with more spacing than medium-weight text?  
2) Is it only me[^1] or does bold text in most fonts become  
 more readable if some spacing is added?

[^1]: I have a problem with peripheral vision so it might  
 very well be just me. However since my field of vision  
 is narrow I typically want blocks of text to be narrower,  
 not wider.  
/BP
author: Benct
